casebody.data:
Ludwig HAAS, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 18, 1924.) No. 243. *1017William E. Kennedy, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. Ralph C. Greene, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Wm. A. De Groot, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
